skillTree.localised_description: Marauder mobs are awarded even greater mobility when riding their crude chariots of bone and wood, lashed together with the guts and sinew of the vanquished.

effects.description: Mount: Chaos Chariot

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

A unit with the Mark of Khorne has:
	➕ Frenzy Passive Ability
	➕ Increased  Spell Resistance
	➕ Increased  Armour
	➖ Reduced  Melee Defence

attributes.bullet_text:
A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.

skillTree.localised_description: The slightest glance, the merest glimpse from one of the Dark Gods is sufficient to propel their playthings to ever-greater feats of desolation.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +40%

skillTree.localised_description: Driven by his devotion to Khorne, Hakka seeks to claim the skulls of his fallen foes as trophies of war. This skill grants bonuses to Hakka's leadership and combat effectiveness for each enemy unit he slays in battle.

effects.description: Wound recovery time: -3

Skulls gained from kills: +5%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Hakka fosters unity and cohesion within his tribe, ensuring that his warriors fight as one formidable force.

effects.description: Melee attack: +15
Melee defence: +15

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

skillTree.localised_description: With a keen eye for plunder and strategic acumen, Hakka leads devastating raiding expeditions into enemy territory. This skill increases the effectiveness of raiding and pillaging actions, yielding greater spoils for the Aesling tribe.

effects.description:

skillTree.localised_description: Hakka commands the beasts of the Northern Wastes, bending them to his will and unleashing them upon his enemies. This skill allows for the recruitment of powerful monstrous units unique to the Aesling tribe

effects.description: Hero capacity: +1 for Skin Wolf Werekin

Charge bonus: +15 for Skin Wolves units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Hakka is tormented by visions placing him amidst slaughter and battle on what appears to be holy ground among those who worship Chaos..

effects.description: Spell resistance: 15%

skillTree.localised_description: In battle, Hakka channels the unbridled rage of Khorne, becoming a whirlwind of destruction on the battlefield.

skillTree.localised_description: As the undisputed leader of the Aesling, Hakka exerts his influence over neighboring tribes and factions, forging alliances or demanding tribute. This skill improves diplomatic relations and increases income from vassals and tributaries.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +20%
Attribute: Devastating Flanker

related_attributes.bullet_text: Entities with this attribute double their charge bonus when attacking the rear or flank of an entity.

skillTree.localised_description: Hakka's indomitable will and unwavering determination make him a formidable foe on the battlefield. This skill grants Hakka increased resistance to enemy debuffs and crowd control effects.

effects.description:
Khorne corruption: +4
	(local province)

skillTree.localised_description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +15
Charge bonus: +30

skillTree.localised_description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

effects.description: Armour: +7
Armour: +15

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

effects.description: Melee defence: +6
Melee defence: +12

skillTree.localised_description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

effects.description: Melee attack: +6
Melee attack: +12

skillTree.localised_description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

effects.description: Ability: "Foe-Seeker"

skillTree.localised_description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%
Weapon strength: +20%

skillTree.localised_description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

effects.description: Hit points: +7%
Hit points: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

effects.description: Leadership: +6
Leadership: +12

skillTree.localised_description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

effects.description: Melee defence: +6
Melee defence: +12

skillTree.localised_description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

effects.description: Ability: "Deadly Onslaught"

skillTree.localised_description: A Chaos Lord dominates – lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who do not bend the knee to the Gods of the North soon find all they hold dear obliterated before them.

skillTree.localised_description: There can be no turning back for those whose souls are turning black.

effects.description: Ability: "Stand or Die!"
Replaces: "Rally!"

skillTree.localised_description: There is no other choice. There never was.

effects.description: Ability: "Fight or Die!"
Replaces: "Rally!"

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5%

skillTree.localised_description: That which is not offered up to the Dark Gods of the North in tribute is harvested by their servants for their own petty gain.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

A unit with the Mark of Khorne has:
	➕ Frenzy Passive Ability

factionEffects.localised_description: The embodiment of Khorne's wrath, leads his warriors with unmatched zeal and unyielding determination. With each swing of his twin axes, he carves a path of carnage, his battle cries echoing across the battlefield, inspiring fear and awe in equal measure among friend and foe alike.

effects.description: Dedicated to Khorne: May only devote himself to Khorne
Diplomatic relations: +30 with Khornate factions
Can send a tribute of Skulls to the Blood God
Colonizing settlements requires skulls, settlements in turn start at tier 2
Blood Hosts will be spawned upon razing settlements for the Hound

Ability: "Khorne's Gaze"
	(all characters)

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

items.colour_text: Forged amidst the frigid chaos of Norsca, the Bloodreavers, twin axes once grasped by Hakka the Aesling, bear the malevolent runes of Khorne's favor. These savage blades, steeped in the lore of northern storms, anticipate the fury of a yet-unfought battle on Zanbaijin's ancient grounds. As Hakka's grim shadow looms, the Bloodreavers thirst for the blood of future adversaries, becoming the embodiment of the Aesling warlord's unrestrained might and the impending tempest that shall echo through the annals of Chaos.

effects.description: Melee attack: +15
Fire attacks enabled
Bonus vs Infantry: +20
Ability: "Bloodreavers''

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The Brazen Armoured berserker is Tribal Chieftain of the Aesling and devote follower of the God of Slaughter.

nodes.localised_description: After bending the knee to Wulfric, the ultimate challenger, this chieftain and the warband that follows him are at the Wanderer's disposal. Their finest warriors will proof valueable in the battles to come.
